name: Forking
description:
This game was built for Trijam #213 in about 4 hours.
Game may contain bugs and there is alot of unfinished stuff, since i've run into many issues with my IDE and skills in Phaser3.

All code and textures were made during the 4 hours.

Controlls:

  • Arrow keys - Movement
  • Space - pickup/drop crates
